title: Blisszi
author: Blisszi
content: Is no longer news that our next President is Obedient, we must deliver him, I urge you all to go out and cast your votes. When God wants to delivered Israel He sent Moses,when He wants to delivered his people from flood, He sent Jonah. Is time for Nigeria to be deliver and God has send a Man call Peter Obi.Tomorrow is Nigeria elections and a new Nigeria is possible. If you agreed we can, we agreed new Nigeria is possible.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Everyone tomorrow is the day, we have all be waiting for February 25th as it is our presidential election. This election would determine a lot after we have been through a very destructive eight year of the present administration.Since formally the rightful age to vote is 18 years so we voter are matured enough to know what’s right, it’s time we vote wisely, we have seen all the the candidates  And we definitely know the most credible person. Let’s put tribalism, religion and financial gains aside and vote wisely.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.created_time: February 26, 2023, 08:40:40 AMLast edit: February 26, 2023, 02:02:33 PM by Belarge
comments.body: If it's free and fair election, obi would win, because in Rivers State and others states have seen so many videos in different pulling units where obi has won with a very long margin, but the problem now is INEC, because inec has the final say, I pray they don't manipulate our votes for peter obi, because I don't understand why uptil now inec have not said anything concerning the results, what is INEC waiting for? I pray our votes for peter obi doesn't go invain...

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Blisszi on February 24, 2023, 07:14:30 PMIs no longer news that our next President is Obedient, we must deliver him, I urge you all to go out and cast your votes. When God wants to delivered Israel He sent Moses,when He wants to delivered his people from flood, He sent Jonah. Is time for Nigeria to be deliver and God has send a Man call Peter Obi.Tomorrow is Nigeria elections and a new Nigeria is possible. If you agreed we can, we agreed new Nigeria is possible.We can't just conclude rashly as this is Nigeria and everything is very possible and concluding Obi is the winner is just giving us false hopes and let's just remain prayerful and pray that the Almighty God give room to who he deans fit to deliver his people out of captivity.Quote from: Belarge on February 26, 2023, 08:40:40 AMFree and fair election, obi has won, because in Rivers State and others states have seen so many videos in different pulling units where obi has won with a very long margin, but the problem now is INEC, because inec has the final say, I pray they don't manipulate our votes for peter obiINEC na one major challenges wey we go get for this election collation and news have it Wike is already working with INEC officials to rig the elections ad manipulate it's outcome.My only fight be say, irrespective of whoever wins, let the election be a free and fair one and that is all I want to see so that we will all know that whatever we face come the next 8 years, was our decision.
